title: XmlQParserPlugin: add javadocs with example (defType=xmlparser)
description:
http://lucene.apache.org/solr/7_0_1/solr-core/org/apache/solr/search/XmlQParserPlugin.html

The example from the Solr Reference Guide could perhaps also be used in the javadocs:
